title: pokerhost
author: pokerhost
created_time: May 15, 2023, 09:55:46 PMLast edit: December 21, 2023, 04:06:09 PM by pokerhost
content: I have a way to run poker tournaments and tables with no downloads required. You simply need to bring the players and set up how you want your games to be run!Software: PokerMavens by BriggsoftCosts:   Gold License $500My services allows you to bring your players to our License while keeping them separate from any other players on the license.  I offer this for $5 to $30 per month pending your usage.I have several PokerMavens Licenses so I can offer you a Stand Alone system aswell...  costs range from $30 to $100 per month-----------------------------------------------------Why Use My Service?The software has many settings and options! You can set and charge your players rake / fees to earn! You keep all your earnings besides what you pay us for our monthly fee!You can use the free trial to test it out and make sure its what you need!Sites We Run....www.runpokergames.comwww.pkrvs.comwww.southernpoker.clubwww.realcardz.com

comments.body: Hello! i can offer you a payment gateway service, so players can buy "poker tokens" using MATIC. ppl only need to have a web3 wallet and matic in their address
